bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Performance Characteristics and Dimensions for Power Transformer and Reactor Bushings
IEEE Standard for Performance Characteristics and Dimensions for Power Transformer and Reactor Bushings
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.19.01-2017 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.19.01-2000)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Electrical, dimensional, and related requirements for power transformer and reactor bushings that have basic impulse insulation levels (BILs) of 150 kV and above are covered. Specific values for dimensional and related requirements that are to be interpreted, measured, or tested, in accordance with IEEE Std C57.19.00™, are provided.

Electrical, dimensional, and related requirements for power transformer and reactor bushings that have basic impulse insulation levels (BILs) of 150 kV and above are covered. Specific values for dimensional and related requirements that are to be interpreted, measured, or tested, in accordance with IEEE Std C57.19.00™, are provided.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
